channel.title: Korasi special bar problem
channel.description: I just added the Korasi spec to my client, but when after i spec the spec bar is still lit. Then as you proceed to attack you do not spec even though it is highlighted till you click on it again. I really dont know whats going on. If you don't know exactly what im talking about i can show you via teamviewer.

item.title: Korasi special bar problem
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

Idk why but it does that btw it’s client sided

Read full topic

item.title: Korasi special bar problem

item.description:
@clawzkillall wrote:

I just added the Korasi spec to my client, but when after i spec the spec bar is still lit. Then as you proceed to attack you do not spec even though it is highlighted till you click on it again. I really dont know whats going on. If you don’t know exactly what im talking about i can show you via teamviewer.
